text: A hassle free clinic. Service is also fast. You wouldn't want to stay long in a clinic when you don't feel well. Dr Andy Kong is also experienced and know what to do

Last Saturday 12.04.2025, I have a flu after get the flu vacination on the previous week. I paid $18 by using Medisave.
On Saturday 12.04.2025 the doctor conduct ART test on me. He said my Covid 19 is positive. He just give me normal medicines eventhough Covid was positive.
Then he didn't give me any MC for that.
Infact I supposed to be ISOLATED from my staff or other people near me for 5 days.
Did he knows the procedure or not.?????
Not recommended.

absolutely do not recommend. brought my partner in who was very sick. doctor dismissed the whole thing as a flu. when he still didnt get better, we went to another doctor who said that my partner had a throat infection and needed antibiotics. the other doctor was surprised that we werent given antibiotics previously. spent $100+ for incompetency.

Very bad experience, young male doctors prescribe medicine, fever to see the doctor actually did not give antipyretic medicine, cough, phlegm, mouth lozenges opened a lot of drugs. This is the first time because of a fever to see a doctor spent more than 100 dollars, the hateful doctor prescribed the wrong medicine can not be returned.
